Plotting Module¶

Map Functions¶

plot_folium¶

Creates an interactive map visualization.

grid.plot_folium(name='my_map', text='inPu')
Parameters:

  • name (str): Output file name

  • text (str): Hover text format (‘inPu’ or ‘abs’)

pyflow acdc
